flashcards.english: Mweri mwerũ wa mũgwanja - a new seventh month (July), Rathimwo na mbeca nyingĩ - be blessed with a lot of money. Vocabulary: Mweri (moon/month), Mweri mwerũ (new month), Rathimwo (be blessed)
flashcards.notes: Traditional blessing for new month using passive form Rathimwo (be blessed). Mweri mwerũ literally 'new month'. Shows cultural practice of blessing others with prosperity at month beginning
